text: The 2007 Yuen Long District Council election was held on 18 November 2007 to elect all 29 elected members to the 42-member District Council. ==Overall election results== Before election: {| style="width:50%; text-align:center;" |+ ↓ |- style="color:white;" | style="background:green; width:24.14%;" | 7 | style="background:red; width:75.86%;" | 22 |- | Pro-dem | Pro-Beijing |} Change in composition: {| style="width:50%; text-align:center;" |+ ↓ |- style="color:white;" | style="background:green; width:13.79%;" | 4 | style="background:red; width:86.21%;" | 25 |- | PD | Pro-Beijing |} ==References== ==External links== * Election Results - Overall Results Category:2007 Hong Kong local elections
title: 2007 Yuen Long District Council election
